name: Software Engineer / Senior Software Engineer
description:
Huawei Moscow Research Center

Welcome to join our Huawei Consumer Business Group (CBG). We are responsible for technical innovation in the hardware platform of mobile smartphones, tablets, PC, wearables and IoT products. Our main goal is to optimize the current and long-term products performance. We develop novel algorithms which help creating the best consumer products in the world.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design and implement internal ML solution for mobile devices
  • Develop low level optimizations of neural networks in terms of performance and power consumption

General Qualifications

  • B.Sc./ M.Sc. in Applied Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, or another quantitative discipline, with remaining knowledge of Linear Algebra, Probability Theory, and Statistics
  • Good knowledge of C/C++
  • Understanding of hardware architecture
  • Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and their complexity

Outstanding Candidates

  • Ph.D., especially with graduation year 2019-2024
  • Knowledge of Linux internals (kernel, system level, processes, etc.)
  • Experience in development for mobile

Important skills to stand out

  • English speaking/writing at Intermediate level
  • Good communication, presentation and collaboration skills
  • Good time management, task prioritization skills

What we offer

  • Work with cutting-edge technologies and challenging tasks, cooperation with best minds
  • Opportunity to collaborate with world academic organizations, participate in top international conferences (we also conduct own meetups and conferences, and develop professional communities)
  • Contribute to real products used by millions of people
  • Competitive compensation and benefits

Location

  • m. Smolenskaya, Moscow, Russia
